description.text: this message file contains message for [name] package

msg.text: Comp $$s is located at an unbonded site $$s which will not be connected to pkg $$s.
Error while writing out relative locations of comp '$$s' in pgroup '$$s' to pad file. \n Relative locations are negative (R = $$d C = $$d).
Vref preference assigned to non vref comp <$$s>. Vref preference ignored.

Rail specification <$$d> on locate vref preference for vref <$$s> is invalid.
 Valid rail numbers are 1 and 2.
 Rail option will be ignored.
Stand alone locate vref <$$s> must have name VREF1_n/VREF2_n where n is a bank number.
LOCATE VREF SITE <$$s> is on bank $$d; however, name <$$s> indicates bank $$d.
Unable to find dedicated resistor site for differential output in bank $$d.
Dedicated resistor site $$s for differential output in bank $$d has been illegally occupied by component $$s.
Dedicated resistor site $$s for differential output in bank $$d has been illegally occupied by differential in/out <$$s>.
Unable to create comp on site <$$s>.
Unable to find a vref driver for VREF <$$s>.
